oracle.adf.model
Interface AttributeBindingListener

All Superinterfaces:
AttributeBindingListener, UpdateListener
public interface AttributeBindingListener
extends UpdateListener, AttributeBindingListener

This Listener will be notified that the associated attribute has been updated and hence the renderer needs to re-render the attribute value.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface oracle.adf.model.UpdateListener
